summary: This is a J.P. Morgan entity account application form for an entity named 'VIRGIN ISLANDS (U.S.)' with an address in the British Virgin Islands. The application is submitted by FINANCIAL TRUST COMPANY INC. as an authorized agent, and Kamla Harry is listed as an authorized person for information access. The document is a standard financial account opening form.

persons.name: Kamla Harry
persons.context: Listed as an authorized individual to receive information about the account, including statements and communications.

events.title: Account Application Submission
events.description: An account application is submitted to J.P. Morgan for the entity 'VIRGIN ISLANDS (U.S.)' via FINANCIAL TRUST COMPANY INC.

keyFacts: An entity named 'VIRGIN ISLANDS (U.S.)' applied for a J.P. Morgan account on March 1, 2001.
The application was handled by FINANCIAL TRUST COMPANY INC. acting as an agent.
Kamla Harry is authorized to receive account information and communications for this entity.
The document is a standard financial form with no explicit mention of Jeffrey Epstein or other key figures in the case.
The document bears a confidentiality stamp requested by JPMorgan Chase.
